answers.author: Randall Partington
answers.text:
Emily,
Finney County does not have a Vacancy Review Committee but it sounds like an interesting idea.  I will be intrigued by comments that are received.

answers.author: Susan Procell
answers.text:
I can contribute the following information:
Vacancy Board Chairman 
Casts the tie-breaking vote if there is a resignation from the Board of Supervisors and a majority of the remaining four Supervisors are unable to agree on the appointment of a replacement. The Vacancy Board Chairman is appointed each year.

author: Emily Graf
text: I am looking for information on Vacancy Review Committees. For example, what are the goals of the committee?  How often does it meet? What progress has it made and what is the makeup of the committee?
title: Vacancy Review Committee
